alert.note: Alert for Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern New Hanover and south central Pender Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Porters Neck, or over Figure Eight Island, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Figure Eight Island, Rich Inlet, Hampstead, Topsail Beach, Murrayville, Bayshore, Scotts Hill, Ogden and Porters Neck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
